Introduction
This topic contains information on reviewing the evidence presented at the hearing, including
analyzing the
testimony for credibility and value
, and
competency of witness testimony
, and
requesting
corroborative evidence
, and
examinations indicated by the hearing evidence
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 1, Section D  - Regional Office (RO) Hearings
citation: Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 1, Section D
